author: paulhauner
content:
After switching to `merge-kiln-v2` Github Actions `ubuntu-latest` boxes are having issues running `make geth`:

```
...
github.com/naoina/toml
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/tracers/js
util.go:46: exit status 2
exit status 1
make[1]: *** [Makefile:12: geth] Error 1
```

CI is still running happily with branches using `merge-kiln`.

I'm having a poke around the diff now, but perhaps <@!360491619402776577> or <@!211091239112671234> have an idea?

https://github.com/MariusVanDerWijden/go-ethereum/compare/merge-kiln...merge-kiln-v2

author: paulhauner
content: My desktop builds `merge-kiln-v2` just fine, perhaps there's a new dependency.
